reqs:
This is a course for a Minor in Education - Special Education.
Registration is restricted to students in the Faculty of Education for the first three weeks of registration.
Students not in the Faculty of Education should contact the course instructor to receive permission to register in this course.
Wait lists are not offered.

courseName: Family-Centred Practice for Children with Special Needs
